bond

Class BondTestRule

  • Object
    • bond.BondTestRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestRule

    public class BondTestRule
extends Object
implements TestRule

    A JUnit rule used to take care of setup and cleanup when using Bond with JUnit. Instantiating a BondTestRule as a field and marking it with @Rule will automatically handle all test setup/cleanup; all that needs to be done besides that is to make observations using Bond.spy().

    For example:

    
   class MyTestClass {
     @Rule
     BondTestRule btr = new BondTestRule()

     @Test
     public void testMyMethod() {
       Bond.obs(...).spy();
     }
   }

    • Method Detail

      • withObservationDirectory

        public BondTestRule withObservationDirectory(File observationDirectory)
        Set the observation directory to be used for this test. If not set, the environment variable BOND_OBSERVATION_DIR will be used instead. If that is also not set, an Exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        observationDirectory - Directory to store test observations in
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

      • withReconciliationMethod

        public BondTestRule withReconciliationMethod(ReconcileType reconcileType)
        Set the reconciliation method to be used for this test. If not set, the environment variable BOND_RECONCILE will be used instead. If that is also not set, a default of ABORT will be used.
        Parameters:
        reconcileType - Reconciliation method to use
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

      • withTypeAdapter

        public BondTestRule withTypeAdapter(Type type,
                                    Object typeAdapter)
        Set a custom serialization method for type. See GsonBuilder.registerTypeAdapter(Type, Object).
        Parameters:
        type - The type for this adapter to apply to
        typeAdapter - The adapter with custom serialization logic
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

        Parameters:

        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

      • withToStringSerialization

        public <T> BondTestRule withToStringSerialization(Class<T> clazz)
        Specify that for objects of type clazz, simply call toString() on the object to serialize it instead of doing a full JSON serialization.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Same as clazz
        Parameters:
